task.name: Boil water
task.pseudocode: Put water in kettle; Turn on the kettle; Wait until water boils

task.description: Fill a container with water and heat it until it boils.
task.name: Boil some water - Task 1
task.pseudocode:
1. Fill a container with water.
2. Place the container on a heat source.
3. Turn on the heat source.
4. Wait until the water boils.

task.name: Fill container with water
task.pseudocode: Open the water source. Place the container under the water source. Turn on the water. Wait until the container is full. Turn off the water.

task.description: Heat the water until it boils.
task.name: Heat water to boiling
task.pseudocode: Place the container with water on the heat source. Turn on the heat source. Wait until the water starts boiling.

task.name: Boil some water - Task 2
task.pseudocode:
1. Get a container (e.g., pot, kettle).
2. Get water from a source (e.g., tap).
3. Pour water into the container.

task.description: Steep tea bag in hot water
task.name: Steep tea
task.pseudocode: Put tea bag in cup; Pour hot water into the cup; Wait for 3-5 minutes

task.description: Place a tea bag in a mug.
task.name: Place tea bag
task.pseudocode: Place the tea bag in the mug.

task.description: Pour hot water over the tea bag.
task.name: Pour hot water
task.pseudocode: Pour hot water into the mug over the tea bag.
